definition: to submerge/to immerse/to sink/to keep down/to lower/to drop/deep/profound/heavy
fragrant/sweet smelling/aromatic/savory or appetizing/(to eat) with relish/(of sleep) sound/perfume or spice/joss or incense stick/CL:根[gen1]

sentences.english: His brother sought Africa and a dish of aloes.
sentences.chinese: 他的兄弟則在找尋非洲和一碟沉香。

sentences.english: I have perfumed my bed with myrrh, aloes, and cinnamon.
sentences.chinese: 我又用沒藥，沉香，桂皮，薰了我的榻。

sentences.english: Objective To observe protective effect of Bawei Chenxiang powder on acute myocardial ischemia in rats.
sentences.chinese: 目的觀察八味沉香散對大鼠急性心肌缺血的保護作用。

sentences.english: I have perfumed my bed with myrrh, aloes and cinnamon.
sentences.chinese: 我又用沒藥，沉香，桂皮薰了我的榻。

sentences.english: Changes my destiny is the Yangzi evening newspaper.
sentences.chinese: 改變沉香姐姐命運的是揚子晚報。
